# INBillPayee

**Class**

The entity that receives the proceeds from a bill payment.

## Declaration

```swift
class INBillPayee
```

## Overview

An [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INBillPayee] object describes an entity that receives payment for a bill. When the user asks Siri to pay a bill, use this information to identify the entity receiving the payment. For example, a payee might represent a utility for which the user has already registered a bill payment option. Users must configure payees in advance using your app. This object contains information that you use to identify one of those preconfigured accounts.



## Initializing the Payee Object

- **init(nickname:number:organizationName:)**: Initializes a payee object with the specified account details.

## Getting the Payee Details

- **nickname**: A user-defined name that identifies a bill-payment account in your app.
- **organizationName**: The name of the company that provides services to the user.
- **accountNumber**: A string to help the user differentiate between similar accounts.

## Bill Data Objects

- **INBillDetails**: The detailed information associated with a bill.
- **INBillTypeResolutionResult**: A resolution result for the types of bills a user might pay.
- **INBillPayeeResolutionResult**: A resolution result for the recipient of a bill payment.
- **INVisualCodeTypeResolutionResult**: A resolution result for the type of visual code used to exchange information.

## Inherits From

- NSObject

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSCoding
- NSCopying
- NSObjectProtocol
- NSSecureCoding
